home.text_base_description: Located on the coveted, sunny North Slope of Potrero Hill, this duplex is the one! The penthouse primary unit (2 bed, 2 bath) has A/C and contains a luxurious primary suite with walk-in closet, gas fireplace, and marble bathroom with steam shower. The open concept kitchen, dining and living space, including large entertainer's deck, have jaw-dropping panoramic views of downtown. The second bedroom has built-in Murphy bed, cabinetry and desks, and can flex as a home office space. 717 also enjoys exclusive use of the 2 car side by side garage. The lower unit spans two levels and has two bedrooms (currently configured as three bedrooms), modern kitchen, and similar panoramic views. There is direct patio access from the lower level. Views do not come at the sacrifice of convenience for this ideally situated home. The shops and restaurants of 18th Street are merely a few blocks away - including Goat Hill Pizza, Chez Maman, Plow and more. 280, 101 nearby.
